dcterms:description: The English CoInCo corpus consists of roughly 2,500 sentences taken from the news and fiction section of the MASC corpus, providing manually annotated lexical substitutes for all content words.
dcterms:title: English CoInCo corpus

dcterms:creator: Diana McCarthy
Roberto Navigli
dcterms:description: The ANVAN-LS dataset is a lexical substitution dataset created for evaluating compositional distributional models, consisting of 165 ANVAN phrases with an average of 4.4 target words for lexical substitution.
dcterms:title: ANVAN-LS
